GapFillInput.Title: Ways of communicating
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type a verb in the correct form in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Did you send|post|give a photo to Mum?
2. I’ve never made a phone call to the USA before.
3. I’m going to leave|write|send him a note and he can meet us at the cinema.
4. How about calling|phoning|ringing|contacting the airport to check the flight times?
5. Let’s go on the Internet and look.
6. Jacques gets|receives|reads|deletes a lot of e-mails from his uncle Steve.
7. Have you checked|read your messages today?
8. Ed and Steph! Come here! I’d like to take|to get a photo of everyone.
9. I’m writing|sending|posting letters to all my sister’s friends.
10. Did you send|write) me an e-mail yesterday?
11. I left a message on Carrie’s answerphone about half an hour ago.
12. Phone|Call|Ring|Text me when you arrive at the station.
